Text: ThanksMr Kaminski Thank you very much for the interview today It was a great opportunity for me to learn more about your company and my pleasure to speak with you I feel that the position is very interesting and challenging I am confident that I can make solid contributions to the company with my background and the training received from the MSCF program Thanks again and I am looking forward to hearing from you soon Sincerely Hao Peng
